instruction: Explain how the given activity can help reduce stress.
input: Going for a jog in the morning
output: Going for a jog in the morning can help reduce stress because it is a form of physical activity that boosts endorphins, hormones in the body that can help alleviate stress and improve your mood. Additionally, jogging can be an effective form of stress management because it allows you to clear your head and be in the present moment, allowing you to forget your worries and focus on the physical task of running.
